original_text: They all joined together constantly in prayer, along with the women and Mary the mother of Jesus, and with his brothers.
korean_text: 여자들과 예수의 어머니 마리아와 예수의 아우들과 더불어 마음을 같이하여 오로지 기도에 힘쓰더라

sentences.original_text: They all joined together constantly in prayer
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 함께 끊임없이 기도에 힘썼습니다

sentences.original_text: and Mary the mother of Jesus
